articles.author: Erin Pearson
articles.title: Former Mr Universe Calum von Moger avoids road rage conviction to allow return to US - The Age
articles.description: The Australian will be able to return to America, where he works as an actor and has a son, after avoiding conviction for a road rage incident in which he used a knife to stab the tyre of a car.
articles.content:
Court documents show von Moger was driving a Ford Ranger when he struck the front passenger side of his victims Toyota Kluger on Millers Road.
The pair were arguing when von Moger stabbed the tyre o… [+2404 chars]
